mapper.select: select p10_project.*,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.court_id,p10_institution.ins_name as insName,p10_outles.outles_name as outlesName,p10_casee.*,p10_court.court_name as courtName from p10_project left join p10_institution on p10_institution.ins_id = p10_project.ins_id left join p10_outles on p10_outles.outles_id = p10_project.outles_id left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_project_casee_re.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 200 and p10_project.project_id = #{projectId} limit 1
